verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician בִּ֭נְגִינוֹת <S%H5058><s%> on Neginoth עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַשְּׁמִינִ֗ית <S%H8067><s%> upon Sheminith מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor בְּאַפְּךָ֥ <S%H639><s%> me not in thine anger תוֹכִיחֵ֑נִי <S%H3198><s%> rebuke וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor בַּחֲמָתְךָ֥ <S%H2534><s%> me in thy hot displeasure תְיַסְּרֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3256><s%> neither chasten

חָנֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> Have mercy יְהוָה֮ <S%H3069><s%> God כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֻמְלַ֫ל <S%H536><s%> for I [am] weak אָ֥נִי <S%H589><s%> I רְפָאֵ֥נִי <S%H7495><s%> heal יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for נִבְהֲל֣וּ <S%H926><s%> are vexed עֲצָמָֽי׃ <S%H6106><s%> me for my bones

וְ֭נַפְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> My soul נִבְהֲלָ֣ה <S%H926><s%> vexed מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> is also sore [וְאַתְּ כ] (וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you ק) יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> but thou O LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתָֽי׃ <S%H4970><s%> long

שׁוּבָ֣ה <S%H7725><s%> Return יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD חַלְּצָ֣ה <S%H2502><s%> deliver נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my soul ה֝וֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <S%H3467><s%> oh save לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> because חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H2617><s%> me for thy mercies'

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there בַּמָּ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> For in death זִכְרֶ֑ךָ <S%H2143><s%> [there is] no remembrance בִּ֝שְׁא֗וֹל <S%H7585><s%> of thee in the grave מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יֽוֹדֶה־ <S%H3034><s%> who shall give thee thanks לָּֽךְ׃

יָגַ֤עְתִּי ׀ <S%H3021><s%> I am weary בְּֽאַנְחָתִ֗י <S%H585><s%> with my groaning אַשְׂחֶ֣ה <S%H7811><s%> to swim בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every לַ֭יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> all the night מִטָּתִ֑י <S%H4296><s%> make I my bed בְּ֝דִמְעָתִ֗י <S%H1832><s%> with my tears עַרְשִׂ֥י <S%H6210><s%> my couch אַמְסֶֽה׃ <S%H4529><s%> I water

עָֽשְׁשָׁ֣ה <S%H6244><s%> is consumed מִכַּ֣עַס <S%H3708><s%> because of grief עֵינִ֑י <S%H5869><s%> Mine eye עָֽ֝תְקָ֗ה <S%H6275><s%> it waxeth old בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all צוֹרְרָֽי׃ <S%H6887><s%> because of all mine enemies

ס֣וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> Depart מִ֭מֶּנִּי <S%H4480><s%> at כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> from me all ye workers אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> hath heard יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice בִּכְיִֽי׃ <S%H1065><s%> of my weeping

שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> hath heard יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD תְּחִנָּתִ֑י <S%H8467><s%> my supplication יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י <S%H8605><s%> my prayer יִקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> will receive

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ ׀ <S%H954><s%> be ashamed וְיִבָּהֲל֣וּ <S%H926><s%> vexed מְ֭אֹד <S%H3966><s%> and sore כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֹיְבָ֑י <S%H341><s%> Let all mine enemies יָ֝שֻׁ֗בוּ <S%H7725><s%> let them return יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> [and] be ashamed רָֽגַע׃ <S%H7281><s%> suddenly
